title: David Crabb & Jia H. Jung: StorySLAM Favorites
teaser: David Crabb finds a video tape that his dad accidentally left in his video camera and Jia H. Jung tries to figure out what to do with her father's ashes.
description: Storytellers David Crabb and Jia H. JungHosted by Dan KennedyAudio Production by Whitney JonesFiles are as they appeared on the podcast some stories include explicit language. Certain words may need to be bleeped to meet specific broadcast standards.
